titleStmt.title: All the letters of the A.B.C. by euery sondrye letter wherof ther is a good document set-fourth and taught in ryme. Translated out of Base-almaine into English..
titleStmt.author: Niclaes, Hendrik, 1502?-1580?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Hendrik Niclaes by STC (2nd ed.).
Place and publisher from STC (2nd ed.).
Contains one illustration, showing a school-room; initial.
Imperfect: creased and worn, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
